title: 4.4 Master Challenge 1
question: A library has an extensive collection of books. It needs a program to quickly check if a specific book is available in its collection just by providing the ISBN of that book. Suggest the best data structure to solve this problem. List at least two reasons for your choice of data structure over others. Create a sample program with the suggested data structure.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
